subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Manny Ramirez, the soon-to-be-free agent who tried to carry the Dodgers on his back in the postseason, says he’ll wait to see who is the highest bidder before deciding if he’ll return to Los Angeles.
snippet: Manny Ramirez, the soon-to-be-free agent who tried to carry the Dodgers on his back in the postseason, says he’ll wait to see who is the highest bidder before deciding if he’ll return to Los Angeles.
